rows.Definition: Translate enterprise strategy into clear capability bets, target states, and sequenced roadmaps with measurable outcomes.
Define, govern, and evolve enterprise/domain reference architectures, patterns, and standards aligned to strategy.
Run platforms as products (SKUs/SLAs/XLAs), set tenancy and pricing/showback, and manage unit cost and adoption.
Provide paved roads and self-service for teams; instrument flow metrics (lead time, CFR, MTTI) to improve developer experience.
Establish modern engineering practices, quality gates, CI/CD, and continuous improvement across teams.
Design for reliability and operability with SLOs, error budgets, capacity policies, and resilience patterns.
Architect and operate scalable, automated compute/network/storage/edge with modernization and FinOps discipline.
Integrate data events, contracts, knowledge graph, and search index to power discovery and decisioning.
Set policy, stewardship, quality, lineage, and privacy-by-design to manage data as a trusted asset.
Design agentic systems and orchestration; embed safety guardrails, evaluation, and registries across the lifecycle.
Inventory models, codify controls, monitor performance/robustness/ethics, and report AI risk to executives.
Design identity-centric protection, detection, and response aligned to zero-trust principles.
Provide 2nd-line oversight, assurance, and reporting on risk posture to ELT/Board.
Deliver end-to-end metrics/logs/traces and product health views to inform operations and decisions.
Run major incident response, continuity, disaster recovery, and chaos testing at scale.
Prioritize, sequence, and govern investments with dependency, risk, and value tracking.
Optimize spend and capacity; balance SLA targets against cost and demand with transparency.
Design value hypotheses, instrument outcomes, and report realized results to CFO/ELT.
Define service portfolio, SLO/XLAs, demand shaping, and customer experience management.
Shape sourcing strategy, govern partners and commercials, and drive co-innovation.
Lead diligence and integration/separation; structure partnerships to accelerate strategy.
Continuously capture voice-of-customer and market signals to inform product and platform bets.
Own roadmap-to-revenue/impact, pricing/packaging, and adoption growth for products and platforms.
Structure teams, roles, decision rights, and flow for outcome delivery across value streams.
Evolve job architecture, skills, coaching, and succession to build high-performing teams.
Build credibility through thought leadership, recruiting brand, and stakeholder storytelling.
Engage ELT/Board on accountability, compliance, and enterprise risk/return trade-offs.
Drive adoption at scale via enablement, champions, communications, and feedback loops.

Lead end-to-end customer solution design: translate outcomes into reference solutions across product, platform, data, and security; document trade-offs; assure NFRs; and guide delivery handoff with guardrails.

Own strategy and lifecycle for digital products and journeys; run continuous discovery and experiments; ensure accessibility and performance; align UX/engineering/operations; and instrument conversion, engagement, retention, and NPS to iterate.

Codify standards and risk controls as code enforced in CI/CD and runtime; define exceptions and lifecycle; track coverage and drift; and automate evidence to reduce audit toil while improving compliance.
